Consider *theoretical studies of grammar*. *Theoretical* is by far the more common adjective, *theoretic* being usually reserved for *x-theoretic* refering to particular theories (e.g., *set-theoretic research* = 'research in set theory' or *model-theoretic research* = 'research in model theory').
